name: Flying Academy Prague
about: Flying Academy Prague is an EASA Approved Training Organization (ATO) based at the Prague Let≈àany International Airport. With over 10 years of experience, we specialize in training future professional and private pilots. Our highly experienced flight instructors and competitive program fees make us a top choice for students worldwide. We offer comprehensive training in accordance with Part-FCL regulations, including online theoretical training and modern facilities such as state-of-the-art briefing and debriefing rooms. Our fleet includes Cessna 152, Cessna 172 RG, Cessna 172 SP, Piper Seminole, and Cessna 172 P aircraft. Located in Prague, a city known for its low cost of living and rich cultural heritage, we provide an ideal environment for pilots to pursue their aviation careers. Our team is dedicated to guiding you through every step of your training with respect and acknowledgement of your needs.
